## Each post is categorised by at least one tag using the [Di√°taxis][diataxis] framework...

- `explanation`: discussions focusing on understanding something.
- `how-to`: concise instructions for getting something done.
- `reference`: information on how something works or how to work with it. 
- `tutorial`: lesson and learning oriented examples of something.

:::
